> <OLD>
>
> "I could said that... I was caught in a compromising situation and I was
> forced to swich sides and now with the blessing of Tucson, I joined to
> Maximals"said Dryly Perceptor while Kup looked his friends and nodded with
> his head and the predacon said"Now I undoing all what i did"
>
> Elita carfully watched hdden behind a corder while Kup proceed to reprogram
> Windlord


Torca nodded once, his large horns looking almost like a large crown,
and giving is movements an almost regal look as he accepted what
Perceptor said. "It would seem that a great many things have happened
since I have been gone." He said his tone low and deep, giving nothing
away about whether he agreed with the decision to allow Perceptor in
or not. Instead he looked over at the reprogramming of Windlord.

Bantor, who stood just behind his commander grimmaced slightly, or
perhaps it was a smile, it was difficult to tell with him sometimes.
"It is good that you have recovered Windlord. He was a valued
warrior." He glanced over at Perceptor, a quizzical look on his face,
but he glanced away. It is obviouis that it would take time for
different ones to get used to Perceptor's presence, but for the moment
Bantor was not attacking him - and for Bantor that was saying a lot!

Torca nodded once more as he turned to leave, "I must check in with
Silverbolt. I left him charge of the Fuzors until I returned." He
looked back at the others, "But there are things that we all must
discuss when I return."

(TAG)

Preston
